column4: Hi all, I want to know how to recompile my kernel to add DMA support on my box, can you tell me why i got (for amd64) 2.6.10 and on apt i only have 2.4 for kernel-source
yes, and the source you need is in linux-tree-2.6.10
AristoMagnus: yes, and the source you need is in linux-tree-2.6.10 (---- where is that
im a gentoo user, i dont really know what your talking about
linux-foo is what Ubuntu uses. kernel-foo is what Debian uses.
naming, of course. You'd search for linux, not kernel.
so i need to search apt-cache search linux-source
I gave you the name of the package you need to install (linux-tree-2.6.10)
is this the source or the bin of the kernel
